Tool

NameImport Table from SQL Query
ID15
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2013

Description

Import a SQL table from a PostgreSQL database.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Output
Table from SQL QueryTable (output)TABLE
Options
HostTextPG_HOSTPassword
PortIntegerPG_PORTMinimum: 0 Default: 5432
DatabaseTextPG_NAMEDatabase Name
UserTextPG_USERUser Name
PasswordTextPG_PWDPassword
TablesTextTABLES
FieldsTextFIELDSDefault: *
WhereTextWHERE
Group byTextGROUP
HavingTextHAVING
Order byTextORDER
DistinctBooleanDISTINCTDefault: 0
